document_title: Lung abscess: Causes, symptoms and treatments
subsection_content: Lung abscess or lung abscess (Lung Abscess in English) is an infectious disease that occurs in lung tissue, after the patient suffers from acute infections such as pneumonia, septic pulmonary embolism... When infected, The patient's lung parenchyma will become necrotic, over time forming pus and abscesses containing pus, dead white blood cells and disease-causing microorganisms.
subsection_title: ap xe phoi.json. What is a lung abscess?
subsection_data:
ap xe phoi.json. What is a lung abscess?
Lung abscess or lung abscess (Lung Abscess in English) is an infectious disease that occurs in lung tissue, after the patient suffers from acute infections such as pneumonia, septic pulmonary embolism... When infected, The patient's lung parenchyma will become necrotic, over time forming pus and abscesses containing pus, dead white blood cells and disease-causing microorganisms.
